display_long_description:
Note: This is our demo version where you can chat, have Emma follow you, change outfits, watch dances, and view YouTube videos. 

We're adding new features every week, so stay tuned! Soon, you’ll dive into richer storylines, edit character events, and Emma will know what you're doing!

Remember, come back each week for fresh surprises!

Pretty please join our Discord and share your dreams with us! Let DayDream make all your wishes come true!

---------------

Immersive Interactions: Meet a virtual friend who’s always ready to surprise you with shining clothes, dances, dinners, and delightful conversations, making every interaction unique.

Personalized Experiences: Customize everything from clothing to stories. Watch her come to life with realistic expressions, movements, and dialogues.

Dynamic Events: Participate in diverse scenarios, from a walk near your home to watching a TV show together. Your companion adapts to your actions in both VR and MR settings.

User-Driven Content: Explore a rich narrative or create your own experiences with our user-friendly behavior editor.

Seamless Integration: Enjoy shared activities like watching videos together and playing mini-games.

Please go to our website to join Discord!
